details.arabic_diacless: هو الأول والآخر والظاهر والباطن وهو بكل شيء عليم
details.arabic: َهُوَ الْأَوَّلُ وَالْآخِرُ وَالظَّاهِرُ وَالْبَاطِنُ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيْمٌ
details.transliteration: Huwal-'Awwalu wal-'Aakhiru wadh-Dhaahiru wal-Baatinu, wa Huwa bikulli shay'in 'Aleem.
details.translations: He is the First and the Last, the Most High and the Most Near. And He is the Knower of all things.
details.reference: Al Hadid 57:3; Abu Dawud 4/329. Declared hasan by Al-Albaanee and al-Arna'uut

pageTitle: If afflicted with doubt in his faith #2
